com.stereoviewer.Camera.Camera ( double  camposx,
double  camposy,
double  camposz,
double  camtargetx,
double  camtargety,
double  camtargetz,
double  camupx,
double  camupy,
double  camupz,
double  field_of_view,
double  znear,
double  zfar,
double  eyespread 
)

Parameters:
camposx the x position of the camera
camposy the y position of the camera
camposz the z position of the camera
camtargetx the x position of the target the camera is looking at
camtargety the y position of the target the camera is looking at
camtargetz the z position of the target the camera is looking at
camupx the x value of the camera's up vector
camupy the y value of the camera's up vector
camupz the z value of the camera's up vector
field_of_view The field of view of the camera
znear The near clipping plane distance
zfar the far clipping plane distance
eyespread the intra ocular distance, or distance between the right and left eyes of the camera
